english_example_sentence: By trying new food recipes, I discovered wonderful flavors.
russian_example_sentence: Пробуя новые кулинарные рецепты, я открыл для себя прекрасные вкусы.
turkish_example_sentence: Yeni yemek tariflerini deneyerek, harika lezzetler keşfettim.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Yeni yemek tariflerini ______, harika lezzetler keşfettim.
